trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived form, provides functionality for loggers that handle events raised by the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] engine.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生窗体中重写时的处理引发的事件的记录器提供功能[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)]引擎。

trans-unit.source: This abstract class provides default implementations for the methods and properties of the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ILogger> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此抽象类提供的方法和属性的默认实现<xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ILogger>接口。</xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ILogger>

trans-unit.source: This class can only be instantiated in a derived form.
trans-unit.target: 仅可以在派生窗体中实例化此类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Utilities.Logger"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="Microsoft.Build.Utilities.Logger"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Generates an error message that is in the default format, from a <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildErrorEventArgs"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 生成错误消息，采用默认格式，源自<xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildErrorEventArgs"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The arguments of the error event.
trans-unit.target: 错误事件的自变量。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents an error message in canonical format.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>表示采用规范格式的错误消息。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Generates a warning message that is in the default format, from a <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildWarningEventArgs"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 生成的默认格式，在一条警告消息<xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildWarningEventArgs"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The arguments of the warning event.
trans-unit.target: 警告事件的自变量。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents a warning message in canonical format.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>表示采用规范格式一条警告消息。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, subscribes the logger to specific events.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，订阅特定事件的记录器。

trans-unit.source: This method must be overridden in the derived class to perform initialization logic and to subscribe to build events published by <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource>.
trans-unit.target: 必须执行的初始化逻辑并订阅以生成由<xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource>.</xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource>发布事件的派生类中重写此方法

trans-unit.source: The available events that a logger can subscribe to.
trans-unit.target: 记录器可订阅可用事件。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.Logger.Verbosity*> setting is at least the value that is passed in.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否当前<xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.Logger.Verbosity*>设置至少是传入单元的值</xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.Logger.Verbosity*>

trans-unit.source: The logger verbosity setting passed in.
trans-unit.target: 传入的记录器详细级别设置。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current logger verbosity setting is at least the value that is passed in; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果当前的记录器详细级别设置至少是传入; 的值否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the user-defined parameters of the logger.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置记录器的用户定义参数。

trans-unit.source: If the derived class does not take parameters, then it can ignore this property.
trans-unit.target: 如果派生的类不采用参数，它可以忽略此属性。

trans-unit.source: The logger parameters.
trans-unit.target: 记录器参数。

trans-unit.source: This value can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此值可为<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, releases the resources allocated to the logger at the time of initialization or during the build.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，释放在初始化时和生成期间分配给记录器的资源。

trans-unit.source: This method can be overridden in the derived class to perform shutdown logic, such as releasing acquired resources.
trans-unit.target: 可以在要执行关闭逻辑，如释放获取的资源的派生类中重写此方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the level of detail to show in the event log.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要显示在事件日志中的详细信息级别。

trans-unit.source: While a logger is free to choose the events it logs, following the verbosity guidelines creates a consistent user experience.
trans-unit.target: 自由地选择它记录的事件记录器时，以下详细级别准则创建一致的用户体验。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 枚举值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.LoggerVerbosity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.LoggerVerbosity"> </xref>。
